SELECT c.id, DATE_FORMAT(c.cure_time,"%Y-%m-%d")as cureTime, c.bootSerial, c.real_flow, c.leakage, c.cure_stress, c.respiratory_rate, c.tidal_volume, c.minu_throughput, c.ai, c.hi FROM sys_curedata c
AND c.bootSerial LIKE concat('%',#{serialId},'%')
group by DATE_FORMAT(c.cure_time, "%Y-%m-%d" ) ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_curedata
cure_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} AND bootSerial =#{serialId} ORDER BY cure_time ASC

SELECT AVG(c.cure_stress) as ylpjz, MAX(c.cure_stress) as ylzdz, AVG(c.inhale_stress) as xqylpjz, MAX(c.inhale_stress) as xqylzdz, AVG(c.exhale_stress) as hqylpjz, MAX(c.exhale_stress) as hqylzdz, AVG(c.ai) as aipjz, AVG(c.hi) as hipjz, MAX(c.ai+c.hi) as zdahi, AVG(c.ai+c.hi) as pjahi, AVG(c.minu_throughput) as fztqlpjz, MAX(c.minu_throughput) as fztqzdz, AVG(c.tidal_volume) as cqlpjz, MAX(c.tidal_volume) as cqlzdz, AVG(c.respiratory_rate) as hxplpjz, MAX(c.respiratory_rate) as hxplzdz, AVG(c.leakage) as lqlpjz FROM sys_curedata c WHERE c.cure_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} AND c.bootSerial =#{serialId} ORDER BY cure_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_curedata ( cure_time, bootSerial, real_flow1, real_flow2, real_flow3, real_flow4, real_flow5, leakage, cure_stress, cure_stress2, cure_stress3, cure_stress4, cure_stress5, respiratory_rate, tidal_volume, minu_throughput, ai, hi, xhb, inhale_stress, exhale_stress, flag ) VALUES ( #{cureTime}, #{bootSerial}, #{realFlow1}, #{realFlow2}, #{realFlow3}, #{realFlow4}, #{realFlow5}, #{leakage}, #{cureStress}, #{cureStress2}, #{cureStress3}, #{cureStress4}, #{cureStress5}, #{respiratoryRate}, #{tidalVolume}, #{minusTroughput}, #{aiCount}, #{hiCount}, #{xhb}, #{inhaleStress}, #{exhaleStress}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT cure_time FROM sys_curedata WHERE bootSerial=#{serialId} AND cure_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(cure_time, "%Y%M%D") ) AS count
SELECT ${colName} FROM sys_curedata WHERE cure_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} AND bootSerial =#{serialId} ORDER BY #{colName} ASC

SELECT c.id, DATE_FORMAT(c.cure_time, "%H:%i:%s" ) as cureTime, c.bootSerial, c.real_flow1, c.real_flow2, c.real_flow3, c.real_flow4, c.real_flow5, c.cure_stress, c.cure_stress2, c.cure_stress3, c.cure_stress4, c.cure_stress5, c.inhale_stress, c.exhale_stress FROM sys_curedata c
c.cure_time BETWEEN #{seleceTime} and #{endTime} AND c.bootSerial =#{serialId} ORDER BY c.cure_time ASC limit 10000

SELECT c.id, c.bootSerial, c.cure_time, c.leakage, c.cure_stress, c.ai, c.hi FROM sys_curedata c
c.bootSerial =#{serialId} and c.cure_time > #{starTime} and c.flag = 0 limit 50

SELECT c.id, c.cure_time, c.mode, c.bootSerial, c.cure_stress, c.min_stress, c.max_stress, c.max_inhaleStress, c.inhale_stress, c.exhale_stress, c.respiratory_rate, c.inhale_time, c.inhale_sensitivity, c.exhale_sensitivity, c.stress_up, c.stress_down, c.avaps, c.soft_version FROM sys_curedata c
c.cure_time BETWEEN #{niceStart} and #{niceEnd} AND c.bootSerial =#{serialId} ORDER BY c.cure_time ASC
